title: A new, dynamic view of chromatin movements

title_detail.value: A new, dynamic view of chromatin movements

summary: In cells, proteins tightly package the long thread of DNA into pearl necklace-like complexes known as chromatin. Scientists now show for the first time how chromatin moves, answering longstanding questions about how its structure helps regulate gene expression.
